meanings.sent1: The playground had colorful semicircles painted on the ground.
meanings.sent2: She cut the cake into semicircles to share with her friends.
meanings.sent3: The semicircles on the clock seemed to be racing each other.
meanings.sent4: Her smile formed perfect semicircles as she laughed.
meanings.sent5: The semicircles of light from the sunset painted the sky in beautiful colors.

meanings.definition: A figure or object in the shape of a semicircle.
meanings.sent1: The rainbow arched in perfect semicircles across the sky.
meanings.sent2: The semicircles of the archway framed the garden beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The semicircles of cheese on the pizza made it look like a smiley face.
meanings.sent4: Her earrings dangled like shimmering semicircles.
meanings.sent5: The semicircles of the bridge reflected in the calm river below.
